instructions: Open the Settings app. Tap your name, then tap iTunes & App Store. Tap your Apple ID, then tap View Apple ID. You might be asked to sign in. Tap Country/Region. iPhone showing the Account Settings page. Tap "Change Country or Region." If you don't see "Change Country or Region," contact Apple Support . Tap your new country or region, then review the Terms & Conditions. Tap Agree in the upper-right corner, then tap Agree again to confirm. Select a payment method and enter your new payment information and billing address, then tap Next. You must enter a valid payment method for your new country or region. 1 Learn more about how to change or remove your Apple ID payment information .
